name: challenge-18-nosql-2-0
description: A social networking web application where users can share their thoughts, connect with friends, and engage with each other's posts. Users can register for an account, create a profile, post thoughts, like and comment on posts, and build a network of friends. The app provides a platform for users to express themselves, stay connected with friends, and discover new content.
author: Brandon (Brodrigo04)
